skins.name: Default
skins.secIdle1Text: Even if it's time to rest, we've got to keep fighting and dancing. Never give up!
skins.secIdle2Text: Northampton thinks she can take me down? Hmph!
skins.secTouchText: Commander, I can feel your encouragement. I'll work even harder!
skins.secSpecialTouchText: E-even if you're just trying to encourage me, there's... there's this thing called being too passionate!

skins.name: Cheerleader On The Playground
skins.secIdle1Text: When you are overwhelmed by all this learning, go for a jog to relax yourself!
skins.secIdle2Text: If you're struggling with the material, then find a tutor. If that doesn't work, get special training...nothing can’t be solved through special training!
skins.secIdle3Text: The Commander has always been the best in my heart, so I have to be in his heart, too!
skins.secTouchText: These courses are too hard...Commander, can you tutor me?
